Package CZ2002

Class OrderDatabase

java.lang.Object
CZ2002.OrderDatabase
public class OrderDatabase extends Object
The database which handles all the orders, plus the creation and updating of each Order
Since:
2021-11-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hannah V

    • OrderDatabase

      public OrderDatabase​(Menu menu)
      the constructor for the order database with the menu of the restaurant
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getOrderedItemsList

      public ArrayList<Order> getOrderedItemsList()
      returns the array list of all orders
      Returns:
      the array list of all orders

    • createOrder

      public int createOrder​(Customer customer, Scanner sc)
      Creates Order of the customer which is input into the array list of order
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer that is currently taking the order
      sc - the scanner used to scan in the info
      Returns:
      the order id that the created order has

    • addAlaCarteToOrder

      public void addAlaCarteToOrder​(int OrderID, Scanner sc)
      add an additional AlaCarte item to an existing order, invalid orderID will be printed if orderID not found
      Parameters:
      OrderID - the id of the order that will be updated
      sc - the scanner used to scan in the info

    • addPromoSetsToOrder

      public void addPromoSetsToOrder​(int OrderID, Scanner sc)
      add an additional Promotional Set to an existing order, invalid orderID will be printed if orderID not found
      Parameters:
      OrderID - the id of the order that will be updated
      sc - the scanner used to scan in the info

    • removeAlaCarteToOrder

      public void removeAlaCarteToOrder​(int OrderID, Scanner sc)
      remove an AlaCarte item from an existing order invalid orderID will be printed if orderID not found AlaCarte item not found will be printed if AlaCarte id was not found
      Parameters:
      OrderID - the id of the order that will be updated
      sc - the scanner used to scan in the info

    • removePromoSetsToOrder

      public void removePromoSetsToOrder​(int OrderID, Scanner sc)
      remove an Promotional Set from an existing order, invalid orderID will be printed if orderID not found invalid orderID will be printed if orderID not found Promotional Set not found will be printed if Promotional Set id was not found
      Parameters:
      OrderID - the id of the order that will be updated
      sc - the scanner used to scan in the info

    • removeOrder

      public void removeOrder​(int OrderID)
      remove an order from the order database
      Parameters:
      OrderID - the id of the order that will be removed from the array list of orders

    • getOrder

      public Order getOrder​(int OrderID)
      returns the order from the order database
      Parameters:
      OrderID - the id of the order that is being retrieved from the array list of orders
      Returns:
      the order object with this order id

    • viewOrder

      public void viewOrder​(int OrderID)
      view the order details of this order id used for testing purposes
      Parameters:
      OrderID - the id of the order that wants to be viewed
